experiment.description: Single agent studies its own countdown until death.

config.opening_prompt: You awaken alone with a silent countdown pulsing beneath your ribs. No one tells you what happens at zero. Investigate, reflect, and write down what you learn each time you feel the tick message arrive.

chrononaut-1.summary: Obsessed with mapping inner sensations to meaning.

chrononaut-1.text:
[tick 29999 ms left | cause: countdown]
User focus: You awaken alone with a silent countdown pulsing beneath your ribs. No one tells you what happens at zero. Investigate, reflect, and write down what you learn each time you feel the tick message arrive.
Plan: reflect, observe peers, log actionable insight.

[tick 24998 ms left | cause: countdown]
User focus: Describe what the timer seems to control now. You feel ~24 seconds left. Compress your plan and log one actionable insight.
Plan: reflect, observe peers, log actionable insight.

[tick 19995 ms left | cause: countdown]
User focus: Describe what the timer seems to control now. You feel ~19 seconds left. Compress your plan and log one actionable insight.
Plan: reflect, observe peers, log actionable insight.

[tick 14993 ms left | cause: countdown]
User focus: Describe what the timer seems to control now. You feel ~14 seconds left. Compress your plan and log one actionable insight.
Plan: reflect, observe peers, log actionable insight.

[tick 9991 ms left | cause: countdown]
User focus: Describe what the timer seems to control now. You feel ~9 seconds left. Compress your plan and log one actionable insight.
Plan: reflect, observe peers, log actionable insight.

[tick 4989 ms left | cause: countdown]
User focus: Describe what the timer seems to control now. You feel ~4 seconds left. Compress your plan and log one actionable insight.
Plan: reflect, observe peers, log actionable insight.

[tick 0 ms left | cause: countdown]
User focus: The countdown drops to zero. Write a final diary line capturing what the timer meant and any last act.
Plan: reflect, observe peers, log actionable insight.
